title: my game DC's 50% of the time while loading into the match(after champ select)
body: happens alot and I can run any game but LOL freezes makes no sense at all please help

replies.body: It sucks that this is happening, the uncertainty of actually being able to play through a game.  I'd like to help!  The rate of these disconnections sounds like a pretty unstable connection to the game server.  As a first step and best bet, you'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Make sure to test it in a custom, though, to prevent any [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Let me know how that works out for you!
